claim: We share our experiences in developing and implementing a departmental inclusive teaching series that included: (i) discussions of modern pedagogical literature and community knowledge-sharing, (ii) interactive workshops led by educational experts, and (iii) a graduate PD course module whereby students design lessons and practice teaching (Fig. 1).
title: Fig 1.
caption: Recommended framework for graduate TA training in inclusive teaching, with suggested timing for each component. See Appendix S1 for the course module resources and links to potential discussion articles. We suggest inviting, and compensating when possible, speakers whose articles sparked particular interest among discussion participants.
